speaker: Tunnel
lines: You walk the torch-lit tunnel toward the pit.
The crowd's roar rolls down the stone.
Footprints overlap on the sandy floor.
A chalk mark on the wall looks like a fighter's luck sign.
You touch the stone and keep moving.
Sand drifts in from the arena.
The bell rings and calls you forward.

choices.text: Slip back to the locker room.
Detour to the promoter for last words.
